author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added missing createCustomBlock() method from previous commit.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added parser for custom blocks, these blocks follow a generic syntax and
allows 3rd party blocks to be added to the template engine.
# Note: The parser currently contains hard-coded block names, this is needed
#       until the autoload system for blocks is in place.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Made output of text elements look more like PHP strings.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added: The comma operator is now checked for in expressions, if found a

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Root parser now handles non-nesting block tags (e.g. break) differently than
- When a nesting problem is detected the block which displays its code is no
longer part of the nested tree structure.
